reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: UNRWA - Supporting the provision of primary health care at UNRWA health centers

description.narrative: Il progetto ha come obiettivo quello di fornire continuità e sinergia con le iniziative realizzate nel settore sanitario negli ultimi cinque anni. Il supporto è destinato ai centri di salute gestiti da UNRWA nella Striscia di Gaza

This project is part of the Italian Cooperation programming for 2018 in Palestine, in continuity and synergy with the initiatives being implemented in the health sector over the past five years: POSIT program and CRONO program. The present initiative will ensure continuity to the ongoing Italian contribution to UNRWA in 2018 fulfilling Italy’s pledges and interventions. Support UNRWA’s health centers in Gaza in order to guarantee health care for Palestine refugees in the strip.
